channel.title: CVE Feed for TemeGUM -- Gum Elementor Addon
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TemeGUM -- Gum Elementor Addon

item.title: CVE-2024-37565|2024-07-22T16:53:07.973Z -- temegum -- gum%20elementor%20addon
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in TemeGUM Gum Elementor Addon allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Gum Elementor Addon: from n/a through 1.3.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-37565|2024-07-20T09:02:55.371Z -- temegum -- gum%20elementor%20addon
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in TemeGUM Gum Elementor Addon allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Gum Elementor Addon: from n/a through 1.3.5.
